name: The Shadow over Hawksmill
overview: Strange things have been happening in the small town of Hawksmill, located in the North East of England. The entire population vanished overnight! You suspect dark forces may be responsible having spent many years studying the pages of the great tome of all things evil - the necromonicon. Could this event be what was foretold in the dark and ancient manuscripts? You are determined to find out what is responsible for the Shadow Over Hawksmill. The Shadow over Hawksmill is inspired by H.P. Lovecraft's Cthulhu Mythos.
